data.author: Shikataganai

changelog.release_notes: Now when there are no torrents shows a Card

- Added colours support for Pebble Time
- Added number of peers in the details of the torrent
- Bug fix
Bug fix when you pause, remove or start a torrent.
Added default values on the settings page.

Added support for the timeline and beautiful coloured icons!
Now you can see in your timeline when you've downloaded the torrents, and check when you'll finish to download the new ones, directly in your timeline without open the WatchApp....all in real time!
Add support for "http" and "https" in the configuration.

- Changed icon of complete torrents
- Fixed a bug that could display the menu even if there was no connection to the server
- Fixed a bug on the progress percent

- List of torrents
- Details for each torrent, such as speed and progress
- Start, pause and remove any torrent

Complete the configuration with all the requested value, and then check your torrents! 
Hold the "Select" button to complete an action on the selected torrent (i.e. remove, start, pause).

data.description:
A remote control for Transmission, with support for the Timeline!

Features:
- List of torrents
- Details for each torrent, such as speed and progress
- Start, pause and remove any torrent
- Timeline shows when you downloaded a torrent or when you will finish to download it. 

Complete the configuration with the IP server and the port (e.g. myserver:9091), and check your torrents from wherever you are! 

Last Update 26/08/2015:
- Changed menu colours
- Added number of peers

latest_release.release_notes: Now when there are no torrents shows a Card

data.title: Transmission Torrent
